name: places/ChIJw_mdPWP2wokRlui6dZHHFrE
formattedAddress: 529 W 145th St, New York, NY 10031, USA
adrFormatAddress: 529 W 145th St, New York, NY 10031, USA

originalText.text: If you are looking for personable service you will find it at Sugarhill Hardware. No way could I have called or walked into a major retailer like Home Depot or Lowes and received the support ( that's beyond service) that I received from this family-owned business. I called, they listened and dispatched a well qualified family member to my home ASAP to correct a plumbing issue. I have never seen anything like it. Professional & serious about my plumbing issue in less than an hour my old faucet was removed and a new one installed. The price was soooo right!!! Thank you Marco (Dad) & sons Jeremy, & Marvin.  I am grateful! Harlem deserves this kind of deliberate love of service to the community. Dr. Pypp

originalText.text: One of my favorite stores in the area, and it all comes down to the employees. The owner and his son are fantastic - always helpful and go out of their way to answer questions. My experience here has never been less than fantastic.

text.text: One of my favorite stores in the area, and it all comes down to the employees. The owner and his son are fantastic - always helpful and go out of their way to answer questions. My experience here has never been less than fantastic.

originalText.text: Best hardware store in area. Very helpful, knowledgeable, and professional. Reasonable prices. Can copy keys. Highly recommend inquiring for assistance, lots of contractors in the area picking up gear.

text.text: Best hardware store in area. Very helpful, knowledgeable, and professional. Reasonable prices. Can copy keys. Highly recommend inquiring for assistance, lots of contractors in the area picking up gear.

originalText.text: These guys are the absolute best! There isn't a better store anywhere! Don't go to the big box stores... These guys have it!

text.text: These guys are the absolute best! There isn't a better store anywhere! Don't go to the big box stores... These guys have it!

originalText.text: I went here on the recommendation of my roommate who sang their praises in terms of helpfulness and I'm happy to say that he was not wrong. I needed to get a piece of wood cut and to purchase a level and screws. I was assisted almost immediately upon entering and was able to get everything done. Friendly and helpful staff and reasonable prices.
